```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(ggplot2)
library(ggmap)
library(maps)
library(mapdata)
```

```{r}
r2d <-function(r)
{
    lat <- floor(r/100)
    lon <- (r - lat * 100) %% 50
    halfb <- (r - 100 * lat - lon)/100
    lon <-  - (lon + 0.5)
    lat <- lat + 60 + halfb + 0.25
    data.frame(lat = lat, lon = lon)
}
es<-read.csv("http://hi.is/~gunnar/LikTol/data98.csv")
reitir<-unique(es$reit)
x<-r2d(reitir)$lon
y<-r2d(reitir)$lat
plot(x,y,type='n')
text(x,y,as.character(reitir))
```

```{r}
island <- map_data("world")
ggplot() + geom_polygon(data = island, aes(x=long, y = lat, group = group)) + 
  coord_fixed(1.3) 
ggplot() + geom_polygon(data = island, aes(x=long, y = lat, group = group), fill="blue") + 
  coord_fixed(xlim = c(-25, -13),  ylim = c(63, 67), ratio = 2.3) 

```
